meanings.definition: A group of lung diseases caused by inhaling cotton, flax, or hemp dust.
meanings.sent1: She developed byssinoses after years of working in the textile factory.
meanings.sent2: Doctors diagnosed the workers with byssinoses due to their exposure to dust.
meanings.sent3: The byssinoses in the factory workers made them sound like wheezing machines.
meanings.sent4: The byssinoses of the lungs felt like tiny fibers clogging up the airways.
meanings.sent5: The severity of her byssinoses was evident in her persistent coughing fits.
